page.title: 17Kids clubs (cont)
page.content: useful things from natural objects. {B.Y.O.}The B.Y.O. is a place for boys and girls,there is a soccer super skills that boys and girls can go to and a 400 metre running track and a football pitch.It has squash courts,snooker and pool tables.They have arcade games and a big hall. {Swimming Club:}At Swimming Club we train extremely hard for galas and medals.Some days we do stroke improvement and some days we do speed. You can achive a lot at Swimming Club.Thats why I enjoy it. {Guides:}at Guides we learn to socialise.At Guides we do a range of things from making things to learning skills.These skills include knot tying,first and helping old people and we go camping.That is fun!
